typeIdentifier.description: Identifies if the product is BasicItem, VariantItem or Master

itemIdentifiers.description: The unique item identifier as provided by the producing system

producer.description: List of all the potential producers

name.description: Customer facing Product Name describing the product
name.example: Healtheries Value Pack Vitamin C 500mg 200 Pack

shortName.description: Short product name used in place where Product Name is too long

description.description: Description of the product; typically exclusive of Brand, size, colour

webDescription.description: e-commerce detailed product description, displays on website product landing page
webDescription.example: Each Healtheries chewable Vitamin C 500mg tablet provides 500mg of pure Vitamin C – the “Immunity Vitamin” to strengthen your immunity ahead of time.

status.description: Determines the lifecycle status of a product in the business from product creation to deletion

modelName.description: Describes the full model name of the product

hierarchies.description: Identifies the type of hierarchy the product belongs to

type.description: Identifies the type of hierarchy the product belongs to

level.description: Identifies the level of leaf node of hierarchy to which the product belongs to

label.description: Identifies the label of the leaf node of hierarchy to which the product belongs to

code.description: Identifies the MDM Enterprise Primary Hierarchy and other alternate hierarchies leaf node identifier where the product belongs to

condition.description: Describes the product condition, that is, if it is New or Refurbished etc

sellingUnitOfMeasure.description: Identifies how a product is tracked in various systems

supplierIdentifier.description: Supplier Code assigned upon creation of the supplier, used to order product

itemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier the supplier uses for their reference

primarySupplierIndicator.description: Indicates if a supplier is the primary supplier for the product

listCost.description: The base unit cost of an item in the purchasing currency

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

purchaseDeliveryTerms.description: The delivery terms the supplier will use to TWG

distributionCentreDeliveryMethodology.description: This indicates how a product will be delivered to store

inners.description: The inner count in a shipping carton, product count if no inner included

unit.description: Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM
Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM

outers.description: The inner count in a shipping carton, product count if no inner included

unit.description: Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM
Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM

innersPerOuter.description: The number of inner units to an outer unit. If no inners, i.e. just an outer unit, then this denotes the count of the number of base units

unitsPerInner.description: The BASE unit count inside an inner

outersPerLayer.description: The packs count in a layer

orderMultiple.description: This is the mulitple type that we must place all orders from the suppliers in

replenishmentMultiple.description: This is the mulitple type that we replenish our stores from the DC

countryOfSource.description: List of Alpha-2 and Alpha-3 ISO Country codes

supplierSiteStatus.description: The delivery terms the supplier will use to TWG

format.description: List of all the potential barcode format

inStoreStartDate.description: The Date a Product will initially be Available in Ranged Stores and availability is measured in stores

inStoreEndDate.description: The Date a Product is stopped being measured for availability purposes in stores

packagingFormat.description: Helps to identify how products are shipped to the DC and whether hangers should be ordered with goods orders

fulfilmentCenterPackagingType.description: List of all possible fulfillment packaging types.

packagedDimensions.description: The dimensions of a product in it's packaging

unit.description: Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM
Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM

displayDimensions.description: Identifies the dimensions of a product when out of packaging or assembled

unit.description: Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM
Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM
Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM
Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM
Also known as Unit of Measure or UOM

highRiskIndicator.description: This field is used by Operations to flag local suppliers who are known to short supply, hence it indicates to stores if product needs to be double checked on receipting

country.description: List of all the ISO Country codes

retailPrice.description: The regular retail price of the product. Retail price is in NZD and GST inclusive

amount.description: The amount in the specified currency

parallelImportIndicator.description: Indicates if a product is Parallel Imported by TWG

preOrderAvailable.description: Indicates if the product is available for preorder

orderable.description: Indicates if the product is orderable or not

sellable.description: Indicates if the product is sellable or not

inventoried.description: Indicates if the product is inventoried or not

recallStatus.description: This indicates what action at stores need to be taken in case of product recall

locations.description: Locations where products should be displayed in stores

methods.description: All ways / methods the product is displayed in store

valueStream.description: Indicates high level Value Stream for the product's intended Lifecycle.

valueStreamDetail.description: Value Stream detail indicating intended length of the product's lifecycle.

countryOfManufacture.description: List of Alpha-2 and Alpha-3 ISO Country codes

countryOfAssembly.description: List of Alpha-2 and Alpha-3 ISO Country codes

countryOfDispatch.description: List of Alpha-2 and Alpha-3 ISO Country codes

inventoryType.description: Describes the type of inventory group the product belongs to

storeReturnAction.description: The action a team member in store will take on a customer returned product

goodsServiceTaxExempt.description: Defines if there is GST (Goods and Service Tax) charged on a product or not

goodsServiceTaxRate.description: This is the GST (Goods and Service Tax) rate that should be applied to products and services in percentage

rangePosition.description: This is internal detail used for range reviews to determine brand/range spread.

events.description: Identifies event relevant to this product for measuring or monitoring. Utilised by DCs for prioritisation of distribution

methodOfPricing.description: Defines how the product is physically priced. Distribution centres use to indicate required action for a product when a price change is actioned

shippingWeightBreak.description: Identifies a pre-defined breakdown of weight breaks that are used for cost and freight calculations as defined by the supplier.

notes.description: Notes that anyone needs to make on a product. Most commonly used by Merchandise teams to note internal information.

priority.description: The priority status of batch for product creation. Urgent & Super Urgent should be treated as High Priority in the workflow.

replenishmentControl.description: This value will determine which system manages the control of the products store levels

rangeClass.description: The range classification of product indicates which stores the product will be ranged in or if it will only be sold online or not sold online

producer.description: List of all the potential producers

creationBatchIdentifier.description: Identifies the batch number the product belongs to

environmentalStatuses.description: The environmental certification of the product

relationships.description: Identifies the type of relationship between products

producer.description: List of all the potential producers

unit.description: List of all the potential Units of Time

networkLocked.description: Identifies if the item is Locked to a specific Network

featuresAndBenefits.description: Features and benefits of product as displayed on e-commerce website

source.description: Identifies the license used on the product

calculationType.description: Indicates the type of method used for royalty calculation for the product. That is retail or cost

percentage.description: Percentage rate of royalty charged for the license of the product

marketingPercentage.description: Percentage rate of marketing charges for the product

channelType.description: Defines which channel the item is to be fulfilled through. A third party or within TWG network (in-house).

returnable.description: Identifies whether a third party product is eligible to be returned under the Change of Mind guarantee policy More information can be found on the Related Documents page.

url.description: URL for the electronic document, such as a PDF for user manual or technical specification.
URL or title of an online video which can be viewed or embedded, such as installation instructions or promotional video.
